calculation_errors.explanation: The Personnel Detail total ($1,443,000) doesn't match the Department Summary Personnel amount ($1,350,000). The detail sheet shows a $93,000 discrepancy.
The Equipment Detail total ($79,400) doesn't match the Department Summary Equipment amount ($215,000). The detail sheet is missing $135,600 worth of equipment items.
The quarterly totals add up correctly, but the distribution across quarters is uneven without justification.

missing_information.description: Signature Page is completely missing from the budget submission
missing_information.impact: Without the required signatures, the budget lacks proper authorization and cannot be officially approved

missing_information.description: Supporting Documentation is missing (quotes for equipment purchases over $5,000, contracts for Professional Services, etc.)
missing_information.impact: Without supporting documentation, large expenditures cannot be verified or justified properly

missing_information.description: Detailed explanation for increases exceeding 10% is missing for Equipment (14.7%) and Miscellaneous (15.6%)
missing_information.impact: Significant budget increases require detailed justification to ensure proper fiscal oversight

missing_information.description: The quarterly allocation percentages are not specified for each category
missing_information.impact: Without specified allocation percentages, it's difficult to verify if the quarterly distribution follows requirements

missing_information.description: Department name and fiscal year are missing from the header of each sheet
missing_information.impact: Without consistent headers, sheets may be misidentified or separated from the complete budget package

compliance_issues.location: Department Summary, Equipment row and Miscellaneous row
compliance_issues.issue: Year-over-year increases exceeding 10% (Equipment at 14.7%, Miscellaneous at 15.6%) lack the detailed justification required
compliance_issues.recommendation: Provide detailed justification for these increases in the Budget Justification section

compliance_issues.issue: Parent account codes (1000, 2000, etc.) are used instead of the most specific account codes available
compliance_issues.recommendation: Use the most specific account codes available for each expense category

compliance_issues.issue: Equipment allocation is heavily weighted to Q1 (70%) without explanation for the non-standard allocation
compliance_issues.recommendation: Either adjust to standard 25% allocation or provide justification for the front-loaded allocation

compliance_issues.issue: The quarterly totals are uneven ($718,000, $597,500, $597,500, $589,000) without explanation
compliance_issues.recommendation: Provide justification for the uneven quarterly distribution in the Budget Justification section
Add the required Signature Page with Department Director signature and approval sections
